channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Gate faulty/dangerous, 7th May
item.description:
The gate between two fields is being held closed with a rock and baling twine. It doesn't open wide enough or long enough to get a horse through.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rotten fence, 7th May
item.description:
Fence between footpath and Wotton Brook is rotten. Further along Porchester Road, Gloucester City Council have repaired the fence but the fence south of Millbridge Road is county responsibility. It is dangerous as someone could fall into the brook.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Millbridge Road, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Recently replaced Kerb stone is not in line with old stones, 7th May
item.description:
The kerb in question is between nos. 19 and 20 Campden Road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Campden Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Wide pothole centre of road, 7th May
item.description:
Outside house called "The Eyrie", Stockwell Lane.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stockwell Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees to large, 7th May
item.description:
Outside 26 insley gardens, 2 trees dangling branches, when reversing off property they drag over car. Please trim and maintain.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Insley Gardens, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Manhole cover must not be on properly, as when you stand on one side, it drops, 7th May
item.description:
Manhole cover on the corner of dunalley street - four way junction right opposite the wan delight chinese takeaway on marle hill parade. has been like that for weeks - has been regular works been done in the area.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Saint Paul's Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly-psoted estate agent sign, 7th May
item.description:

item.title: Grass verges not been mowed this year., 7th May
item.description:
On the main Innsworth Lane alongside the houses of 1/4 Tern Court on Rookery Road. Innsworth. GL31AY. This area used to be cut by Tewkesbury borough council but as not been done this year at all. Spoken to them and I have been told it now comes under Gloucestershire Highways. There are 2 grass verges on this area that need cutting as it is very unsightly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 156, Innsworth Lane, Innsworth, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
